A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Movie gets half a star for looking gorgeous but minus 4.5 stars for screwing up the all time greatest hero of the galaxy.  The legend of luke skywalker was trashed / shit on by this movie.  We waited years to have Skywalker return and this movie shit all over our expectations.  If you love Star Wars\, pass on Sequel trilogy as Star Wars ended properly with 1 thru 6.
